clauses.title: Your account can be deleted without prior notice and without a reason
clauses.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.
clauses.clause_text: We may suspend or terminate your account or cease providing you with all or part of the Services at any time for any or no reason, including, but not limited to, if we reasonably believe you have violated these Terms.

case.text: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason

clauses.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
clauses.description: The service logs the URL of the last web page you visited before visiting the Site and may use that information to gather more data about you.
clauses.clause_text: Full quote: "When you use our Services, we may receive information (“Log Data”) such as your IP address, browser type, operating system, the referring web page"

case.text: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

clauses.title: You are tracked via device fingerprinting
clauses.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.
clauses.clause_text: device information (including device and application IDs)

case.text: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

clauses.title: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you
clauses.description: If the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they may not inform/notify the user while complying with the request.
clauses.clause_text: For all MeWe customers disclosure is governed by U.S. law, including the Federal Stored Communications Act (the “SCA”), 18 U.S.C. Sections 2701-2712, as well as by our own Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. In general, we will turn over “basic subscriber” records (i.e., name, email address, phone number, and so on) in response to a valid subpoena that is issued in connection with an official criminal investigation.

case.text: Your personal data may be disclosed to comply with government requests without notice to you

clauses.title: Your personal data is given to third parties
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.
clauses.clause_text: If you make payments on MeWe, we may share your payment information with third-party payment service providers to process payments.

case.text: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

clauses.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes
clauses.description: Your Personal Data is only used for the essential purposes of the Service, which are clearly defined on the Agreements. For instance, the Service won't abuse your data to deliver targeted advertisements to you or for marketing purposes.
clauses.clause_text: MeWe uses your Content Data for the sole purpose of serving and providing you with the full experience of MeWe.

case.text: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection (Los Angeles; California; USA)
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for protecting citizens privacy with strong data regulations. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case why the jurisdiction is friendly to user privacy protection.

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.

clauses.title: Archives of their agreements are provided so that changes can be viewed over time
clauses.description: This case applies to Services whose agreements provide previous versions, so that users can compare them and understand how the Service seems to evolve regarding user rights.
clauses.clause_text: Archive of Previous Terms

case.text: Archives of their agreements are provided so that changes can be viewed over time

clauses.title: The message in "Secret Chat" are encrypted, and MeWe cannot decrypt it
clauses.description: Content generated by the users is end-to-end encrypted, in a way that it can't be accessed by anyone unauthorised, and even the service has no technical means to decrypt it.
clauses.clause_text: MeWe offers Secret Chat as an option for MeWe users. MeWe has no way to decrypt Secret Chat messages of MeWe users because the messages are end-to-end encrypted and MeWe does not have any knowledge of their private keys. The encrypted messages and media (images, videos etc.) in MeWe Secret Chat are deleted on MeWe servers after they have been delivered successfully.

case.text: User-generated content is encrypted, and this service cannot decrypt it

clauses.title: You can delete your content from this service
clauses.description: You can ask the service to remove your content at any time, and it's deleted within a reasonable time.
clauses.clause_text:
Right to Erasure

At all times you have an easy way to opt out of our service and delete your account as well as ALL of your Content Data, if you do not wish to continue using our services.

case.text: You can delete your content from this service

clauses.title: You can retrieve an archive of your data
clauses.description: Users can request a copy of the data collected through the services and infer from it the amount of personal information that is processed and stored by the Service. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: At any time you can retrieve your entire Content Data package from MeWe, using the “Download Your Content” feature in your account.

case.text: You can retrieve an archive of your data

clauses.title: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable
clauses.description: The Agreement explains they will disclose personal data about you if it is reasonably necessary to comply with applicable law and government requests.
clauses.clause_text:
MeWe will only respond to requests from non-U.S.
law enforcement agencies that are issued by a U.S.
court either by way of a mutual legal assistance treaty or a letter rogatory.

case.text: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable

clauses.title: You will be notified if personal data has been affected by data breaches
clauses.description: Should the personal information of a service be compromised, the service will inform users if any personal data has been affected by data breaches. This case is also related to privacy.
clauses.clause_text: If MeWe learns of a security systems breach, then we may attempt to notify you electronically so that you can take appropriate protective steps.

case.text: You will be notified if personal data has been affected by data breaches

clauses.title: No third-party analytics or tracking platforms are used
clauses.description: There are no Google Analytics or other tracking codes embedded in the service. Any tracking is performed by the service itself.
clauses.clause_text: We NEVER use cookies for third-parties to target you or market to you.

case.text: No third-party analytics or tracking platforms are used

clauses.title: Pseudonyms are allowed
clauses.description: You don't need to provide your full name to use the Service and you are allowed to use a pseudonym instead.
clauses.clause_text: While you may use MeWe pseudonymously or as a parody, commentary, or fan account

case.text: Pseudonyms are allowed

clauses.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
clauses.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.
clauses.clause_text: You have the right to delete your account and take your content with you at any time.

case.text: You have the right to leave this service at any time

clauses.title: Information is provided about security practices
clauses.description: It's important to know what security measures are taken to protect your data from unauthorized access. This case applies to the Agreements that precisely explain their security practices.
clauses.clause_text:
Security: HTTPS and Encryption

We maintain physical, electronic, and procedural safeguards to protect the confidentiality and security of your personal user data and other information transmitted to us. For example, we encrypt your personally identifiable information, and most, if not all requests from you to the server are created over a secure connection (HTTPS).

case.text: Information is provided about security practices

clauses.title: Your content can be deleted if you violate the terms
clauses.description: Content infringing the Terms of Service (or the Acceptable Use Policy or equivalent) may be removed, with or without notice.
clauses.clause_text: MeWe reserves the right to remove objectionable content without notice. MeWe can remove any content or information you post at MeWe if we believe that it violates our Terms of Service.

case.text: Your content can be deleted if you violate the terms

clauses.title: You are prohibited from sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages
clauses.description: Users are not allowed to use the service for chain letters, junk mail, spamming or any other distribution of content to people who have not agreed to receiving it.
clauses.clause_text:
.
  • Send unsolicited or unauthorized advertising or commercial communications, such as spam.

case.text: You are prohibited from sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages

clauses.title: Spidering, crawling, or accessing the site through any automated means is not allowed
clauses.clause_text:
• Engage in spidering or harvesting, or participate in the use of software, including spyware, designed to collect data from the Site or Services.
  • Use automated methods to use the Site or Services.

case.text: Spidering, crawling, or accessing the site through any automated means is not allowed

clauses.title: You are prohibited from posting content which promotes violence or politically or religiously extremist values.
clauses.description: Users are not allowed to post extremist political or religious content. They are also not allowed to post content that glorifies violence.
clauses.clause_text: • Post content that is hateful, threatening, harmful, incites violence. or contains graphic or gratuitous violence.

case.text: You are prohibited from posting content which promotes violence or politically or religiously extremist values.

clauses.title: MeWe is only available to users over 16 years old
clauses.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.
clauses.clause_text: The use of MeWe is for all persons age 16 and over who agree to these Terms of Service.

case.text: This service is only available to users over a certain age

clauses.title: Your account can be suspended for several reasons
clauses.clause_text: MeWe reserves the right to ban Pages, Groups and users that do not comply with its Terms of Service as assessed in MeWe’s sole discretion and interpretation of its Terms of Service

case.text: Your account can be suspended for several reasons

clauses.title: The posting of pornographic content is prohibited
clauses.description: Users are not allowed to post any content of pornographic nature. This includes adult content, things that are sexually explicit, or obscene.
clauses.clause_text: • Post unlawful, harmful, obscene, or pornographic content.

case.text: The posting of pornographic content is prohibited

clauses.title: First-party cookies are used
clauses.description: First-party cookies only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.
clauses.clause_text: Cookies on MeWe let you log in and out of MeWe without needing to retype your login and password

case.text: First-party cookies are used

clauses.title: You must report to the service any unauthorized use of your account or any breach of security
clauses.description: The service asks the user to notify them immediately of any unauthorized use or security breaches.
clauses.clause_text: you agree to notify MeWe immediately of any unauthorized access or use of your MeWe account

case.text: You must report to the service any unauthorized use of your account or any breach of security

clauses.title: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
clauses.description: The user agrees not to commit any unlawful acts through the use of the website, including the posting of illegal content or messaging.
clauses.clause_text: Violate any law or regulation

case.text: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

clauses.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
clauses.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.
clauses.clause_text:
You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your MeWe account information, including your username and password.
You are responsible for all activities that occur under your MeWe account

case.text: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

clauses.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
clauses.clause_text: When you use our Services, we may receive information (“Log Data”) such as your IP address

case.text: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
